name: gubnota/gubnota
description: Autoload class helper to call class methods by using Laravel 4 alike mechanism via static calling and by-pass variables to other method which simplifies storing same class instace without using global keyword quite outdated solution. With composer pakagist psr-0 autoloader use better, otherwise please declare autoloading in psr-0 (or 4) PHP default order by looking via folder alike class namespaces, etc.
